body.name: Auto Keystone Mini Portable Projector, 4K/200 ANSI Smart Projector with WiFi 6, BT 5.0, Screen Adjustment, 180 Degree Rotation, Built-in Android 11.0 OS
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 7 hrs 27 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 57 mins
features: 【The Freestyle Projector】Magcubic latest HY300 projector features Android TV 11.0 OS and Allwinner H713 smart chip. Equipped with 1GB+8GB ROM storage, it can stream movies, shows, live sports and music freely. You can always enjoy video fun without additional media players. Built-in 3W*1 HiFi speakers.

【WiFi6 & BT 5.0 Video Projector】Magcubic HY300 Portable Projector uses the latest WiFi6 technology, higher transmission rate and lower latency than 5G, a few seconds will be wirelessly synchronized to get a big screen. No additional adapter required. Built-in BT 5.0 chip, the projector allows you to connect the ideal Bluetooth speaker/headphone at any time and save every detail of the sound effect to offer you different sound scenes.

【Auto Keystone Correction】 The HY300 mini projector adopts manual focus and auto keystone correction technology, built-in high-precision sensor, detects real-time movement and focuses faster and more accurately. Please use manual focus after the projector boots up. Auto keystone correction can automatically correct the image up and down. If you want to adjust the side projection, please use the remote control.

【Multifunctional Smart Projector】 This versatile, intelligent miniature theater projector is easy to take anywhere: With a stand that rotates almost 180 degrees, you can position your image from floor to ceiling where you want it. The Freestyle gives you the flexibility to view your favorite images on the large 130-inch screen.

【4K/ 720P FHD Home Theater Projector 】 With 1280*720 native resolution, 10000:1 high dynamic contrast ratio, and support Full HD 4k videos. The 50% zoom function and lower noise to 25 dB ensure an impressive sound environment.(Remote batteries not included)

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.8 3.8 out of 5 stars 37 ratings 3.8 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Built-in Android 11.0 operating system Update Android 11.0 OS: Use Android 11.0 chip, Magcubic customized 4-core ARM Cortex-A53 high-performance low-power chip and G31 GPU, bringing the latest smart TV integration solution technology into your private cinema brings. Your projector is much faster and more compatible, and can easily multitask in the background. Note: When connecting the Fire TV Stick 4K it made a strange noise and the image was not displayed with correct colorsSolución: Video: Settings - Screen and Sound - Screen - Dynamic Range Settings - Adaptive. Audio: Settings - Screen and Sound - Audio - Surround Sound - PCM. Wireless WIFI Cast/Mirroring The wireless WIFI projector is compatible with IOS, Android smartphones, tablets and laptops. (Built-in projection software: Airpin and Miracast; you don't need to download or install other application.) Miracast: Ensure Android devices (phone,pad,ect) are in the same network with the HY300 projector How to operate: Home Screen-My Apps->Miracast->Open miracast service->Turn on the phone mirroring->Connection Airpin: Ensure IOS devices (iphone,pad,ect) are in the network with the HY300 projector How to operate: Home Screen-My Apps-> Airpin -Open Airpin service->Turn on the phone mirroring>Connection Automatic keystone correction Auto keystone correction is on by default (keystone correction only applies to top and bottom, you need to adjust left and right directions, turn off auto keystone correction for four-point correction). For four-point correction: go to settings and adjust according to the projected image. Image zoom 100% – 50% You can reduce the image from 100% to 50% with the remote control without moving this projector. Compatible with various devices Thanks to the built-in USB, HD, AV and audio port, you can use this film projector with U disk, TV stick, laptops, speakers, etc.

Dual band WiFi 6 + BT5.0 Latest wireless Wi-Fi 6 connection, faster and smoother, support IOS, Android, Windows； Enjoy your favorite movies, music and games on the bigger screen in just a few seconds. High speeds of up to 1500Mbps for lag-free gaming and smooth HD streaming. Higher speed, lower latency, larger capacity, more secure network. Dual-band WiFi (2.4GHz/5.8GHz) for seamless mobile and tablet connectivity. (Built-in projection software: Airpin and Miracast; you don't need to download or install other application.)

Allwinner 713 The Mali G31 architectures offer a configurable set of graphics and GPU compute IP that allows a silicon implementer to choose the number of shader cores and the level 2 cache size. This configurability allows each implementation to find the right balance of power, performance, and silicon area to meet their needs. One of the strengths of the GPU is its low power consumption, which makes it ideal for use in battery-powered devices. It also supports OpenGL ES 3.2, Vulkan 1.1 and OpenCL 2.0. The GPU also features a number of optimizations, including advanced texture compression, that help reduce memory footprint and improve system performance. It also supports hardware-based security features that help protect user data from potential security threats.

Innovative automatic keystone correction and four-point correction 4P Manual ±15° to 45° (vertical and horizontal) and 4D Auto keystone correction, easy to get a perfect square picture, and small angles are also supported. (For the four-point correction, the automatic keystone correction must be switched off.)

180° rotatable/portable It's easy with this versatile projector: the 180-degree rotating stand lets you place the image anywhere from floor to ceiling, giving you the flexibility to play videos. Portable and Lightweight: Say goodbye to the hassle of heavy, bulky projector chains and projector stands. The Magcubic HY300 mini projector with charging cable and 180° rotation is portable and can be used for various purposes. (You just need to put it in your backpack bag or travel case), E.g. when camping, traveling or at outdoor parties. Thanks to the mini size of 10.08 x 10.35 cm and the net weight of 500 grams, it is perfect for carrying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Now we can watch movies outside on our backyard! Looove it!The quality is awesome for indoor and outdoor. Works great with 100 inch screen. Image is very sharp. I’m truly surprised with the quality for this price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I tried to connect it to differnte WiFi sources and it never happened, so if there’s no WiFi anything else will work , no instructions or something to do if someone is having problems to connect to a WiFi red

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small and portable
reviews.reviewText: It works great but sadly had like an old android operating system. And the built in speaker sucks not loud or dynamic like the description says. I’d suggest buying a speaker to connect it to. Also the fan is louder than the speaker itself. I’m keeping it because it’s for my guest room and I connected a fire stick to it but not the best projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is great. the picture is clear and the settings are easy to figure out. I was surprised about the picture quality with the lights on, I could clearly see he screen. great gift for those in smaller places who don't wanna take up so much space with a TV

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vivid colors and high definition images.
reviews.reviewText: "Incredible clarity and convenience! This mini projector delivers stunning 4K quality with seamless WiFi connectivity and Bluetooth capabilities. The auto keystone feature makes setup a breeze, and the screen adjustment ensures a perfect viewing experience. A game-changer for movie nights and presentations alike!"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: Really impressed by this little light weight projector.Having an android operating system makes it work so well, basically like a smart TV but better. We installed a few streaming apps and have been using it around the house.With it being so light weight and quick to set up, we're going to be getting a lot of use out of it during family road trips, or even just out in the back yard. In fact, we are gearing up for a move, so before we get to mounting TVs this will be getting a good work out.My photos are from middle of the day when I was playing with it a bit, I really do like how quick it was to set up and get going. Reading other reviews I made sure to do the updates and it's running nice and smooth.Overall, definitely a good purchase, for the price it has more features than I anticipated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The image is pretty good! This is a nice little projector and the round design is pretty classy. My brother in law is loving it for his birthday gift.

Das Mini-Projektorstativ hat meine Erwartungen übertroffen und sich als äußerst vielseitig und praktisch erwiesen. Als begeisterter Fotograf und Projektorenutzer hat dieses faltbare Tischstativ meinen Workflow erheblich verbessert.Die kompakte Größe und das faltbare Design machen dieses Stativ zu einem hervorragenden Begleiter für unterwegs. Egal, ob ich einen Mini-Projektor oder eine Kamera im Freien verwende, das Stativ bietet eine solide Unterstützung und Stabilität.Die Einstellung der Höhe von 12" bis 20" ermöglicht es mir, den perfekten Blickwinkel für meine Projekte zu finden. Ich war beeindruckt von der Stabilität des Stativs, selbst wenn ich ein schwereres Gerät mit einem Gewicht von bis zu 2LB (1kg) darauf platziert habe.Die Montage ist ein Kinderspiel. Das Stativ lässt sich mühelos aufstellen und fixieren. Die rutschfesten Gummifüße sorgen für zusätzliche Stabilität und verhindern ein Verrutschen, selbst auf glatten Oberflächen.Ich habe das Mini-Projektorstativ bei verschiedenen Gelegenheiten verwendet - sei es bei Outdoor-Fotoshootings oder beim Genießen eines Kinoabends im Garten mit meinem Projektor. Es hat jedes Mal hervorragend funktioniert und mir geholfen, qualitativ hochwertige Ergebnisse zu erzielen.Insgesamt bin ich sehr zufrieden mit dem Mini-Projektorstativ. Es ist praktisch, robust und bietet eine zuverlässige Unterstützung für eine Vielzahl von Geräten. Ich kann es allen Fotografen, Projektorliebhabern und Outdoor-Enthusiasten wärmstens empfehlen. Dieses Stativ wird sicherlich zu einem unverzichtbaren Teil Ihrer Ausrüstung!

Ein hervorragender Ständer, der es ermöglicht, die Kamera bei Videokonferenzen auf Gesichtshöhe zu halten und somit die unerwünschten Auswirkungen von Tauchen und niedrigen Blickwinkeln zu vermeiden, ist zweifellos ein unverzichtbares Zubehör für jeden, der in der heutigen Zeit viel Zeit mit virtuellen Meetings verbringt. Das Beste an diesem Ständer ist, dass die Höhe leicht verstellbar ist und es eine rotierende Kugel gibt, mit der das Gerät perfekt positioniert werden kann. Darüber hinaus hält der Ständer das Gerät sicher und stabil an Ort und Stelle. In Kombination mit einer Spezialkamera wird die Qualität der Aufnahmen fast professionell und lässt somit jeden Teilnehmer in bester Qualität erscheinen.

Das Stativ für den Mini-Projektor hat meine Erwartungen übertroffen! Es ist sehr stabil und lässt sich leicht verstellen. Die Höhenanpassung ist praktisch und ermöglicht es mir, den Projektor perfekt auszurichten. Die Montage war einfach und das Material fühlt sich hochwertig an. Es ist auch leicht und kompakt, ideal für unterwegs. Insgesamt bin ich sehr zufrieden mit diesem Stativ und kann es nur empfehlen.

Sehr stabiler Projektorhalter aus Metall Geeignet für alle Projektorgrößen und -typen, auch für den Einsatz mit Kamera. Es kann auch gefaltet werden und die gefaltete Größe ist sehr einfach zu tragen, geeignet für kleine Familie oder Büro verwenden.
Egal ob zuhaus oder unterwegs. Nice
